>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/device/{deviceID}/chunk/backup"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Export a chunk as CSV to Files

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":false,"description":"Can be generated in your profile settings (Required)","example":"(Your profile-token)","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"Content-Type","in":"header","required":false,"example":"application/json","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"deviceID","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Required","example":"(Type a device ID)","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"headers":{},"description":"Chunk exported to Files","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"boolean"},"result":{"type":"object","properties":{"chunk_id":{"type":"string"},"file_address":{"type":"string"}}}}},"example":{"status":true,"result":{"chunk_id":"1657497600_1658102399","file_address":"device/62a2643dcc8dd60012eb4838/2022-07-11_2022-07-17.csv"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
